attributes.action: Prosecute the perpetrators of racial abuse
attributes.additional_details: The England team's loss in the final has magnified the problem of racism in British society. In this sense it could be used as a WIN FOR THE COUNTRY IF WE MAKE AN EXAMPLE OF THE PERPETRATORS. This is nothing to do with football. This is an excuse for the filth of society to act on their sickening ignorance, twisted upbringings & miseducation. A football match has given them an outlet. STOP THIS NOW
attributes.background: Identify, name & prosecute every proven perpetrator of racial abuse

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for the police and prosecuting authorities.
